youtube.description:
Nico Preti of Rigly presents: Using multisig to protect hashrate delivery so everyone can mine bitcoin again while figuring out how to pay out coinbase sats over lightning.

Speaker Twitter: https ://twitter.com/NicoP2010
Learn more about Rigly: https://rigly.io

btcpp website: https ://btcplusplus.dev/
btcpp twitter: https ://twitter.com/btcplusplus

Recorded at the Palmer Events Center, 29 April 2023 in Austin, Texas.
